title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Design: Intensive Short-Term Course for Practitioner Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education field experience and basic knowledge of social studies subjects
context.additional_context: Social studies skill enhancement learning design process for current professionals in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand technology-enhanced learning design principles and apply them to real educational scenarios
Learners can design effective digital learning activities in resource-constrained technical environments
Learners can propose technology utilization strategies to increase learner engagement through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
